ModMetaData.name: Geothermal Power Extender Compatibility Pack
ModMetaData.author: Emoryoakley (Exiler)
ModMetaData.description:
[h1][b]Mod Name: Geothermal Power Extender Compatibility Pack[/b][/h1] [h2][i]Latest Version: 1.5.20250408[/i][/h2]
[i]If the mod isn’t auto-updated, please resubscribe to the mod and verify the integrity of the files.[/i]
[h3][url=https://github.com/emoryoakley/GeothermalPowerExtendersCompatibilityPack/blob/master/README.zh.md]繁體中文說明[/url] | [url=https://github.com/emoryoakley/GeothermalPowerExtendersCompatibilityPack/blob/master/README.md]English README[/url][/h3] [hr][/hr] [h3][b]Introduction[/b][/h3] This is a mod that improves [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3373466885]Geothermal Power Extenders[/url]'s compatibility.
Now, you can build power extenders next to the geothermal generator provided by other mods, and construct power extenders in the diagonal direction of the geothermal generator.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/ITOF6R7.gif[/img]
The main reason I developed this mod is that while working on a self-made mod - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3456671049]Smaller Geothermal Generator (更小的地熱發電機)[/url], I found it was incompatible with [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3373466885]Geothermal Power Extenders[/url]. Since [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3373466885]Geothermal Power Extenders[/url] is widely used by many players, I decided to create a compatibility patch to make it support other geothermal generators.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/nA0kvEb.gif[/img]
[hr][/hr] [h3][b]How to Use[/b][/h3] [olist] [*] Subscribe to or download this mod from the release page. [*] Enable this mod in the game. (This mod [b]must[/b] be loaded after [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3373466885]Geothermal Power Extenders[/url].) [*] Go to the mod settings to configure the geothermal generator you want to support and whether it can be constructed diagonally. [*] Use this mod just like [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3373466885]Geothermal Power Extenders[/url] normally. [/olist]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/npbYVTE.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/VQ6Ubxh.gif[/img]
[h3][b]Language[/b][/h3] This mod includes built-in support for: [list] [*] Traditional Chinese (繁體中文) [*] Simplified Chinese (简体中文) [*] English [/list] Feel free to create and share your own language translation mods to extend compatibility. [h3][b]Compatibility[/b][/h3] [list] [*] [b]The following mods have been tested, and all of them are compatible with this mod.[/b] [list] [*] Core (Vanilla) [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1409449372]Higher Power[/url] [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3456671049]Smaller Geothermal Generator (更小的地熱發電機)[/url] [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2079579039][sd] Advanced Powergeneration (Continued)[/url] [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=2032409628]Advanced Power Plus[/url] [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=2654846754]Vanilla Factions Expanded - Ancients[/url] [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3411401573]Vanilla Quests Expanded - The Generator[/url] [/list] [*] [b]The following mods are still usable and compatible with this mod, even though they haven't been updated to the latest game version, 1.5.[/b] [list] [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2086966048]Advanced Geothermal Generator[/url] [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1541519278]M-13's Geothermal Generators[/url] [/list] [*] [b]The geothermal generators provided by other mods can theoretically be supported, not limited to the ones mentioned above.[/b] [/list]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/CXBbzeA.png[/img]
[h3][b]Other Notes[/b][/h3] [list] [*] This mod depends on [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3373466885]Geothermal Power Extenders[/url]. [*] Please load [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3373466885]Geothermal Power Extenders[/url] before loading this mod. [*] For additional details, please refer to the [url=https://github.com/emoryoakley/GeothermalPowerExtendersCompatibilityPack]GitHub repository[/url]. [/list]
